overview: Four girl friends in their late twenties go on a reunion weekend to the sea, to the house where they spent their teenage years. What should have been a convivial gathering deteriorates into an unavoidable personal and mutual confrontation. They understand that they must reassess their friendship and realize that their lives have changed for ever.

production_companies.name: Casa Kafka Pictures Movie Tax Shelter Empowered by Dexia

title: High Heels, Low Tide
